column221: an increased risk of cancer and unusual facial features.UPDATE 1-U.S. FDA approves 23andMe's genetic screening test for rare disorderU.S. FDA approves 23andMe's genetic screening test for rare disorderYouTube to release kids app next weekUPDATE 1-Market Chatter-Corporate finance press digestItalian privacy watchdog says to conduct inspections at Google U.S. officesGoogle wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over Android app limitsGoogle wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over Android app limits A federal judge on Friday dismissed a lawsuit accusing Google Inc of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers that use its Android operating system to make the search engine company's own applications the default option. column183: an increased risk of cancer and unusual facial features.U.S. FDA approves 23andMe's genetic screening test for rare disorderYouTube to release kids app next weekUPDATE 1-Market Chatter-Corporate finance press digestItalian privacy watchdog says to conduct inspections at Google U.S. officesGoogle wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over Android app limitsGoogle wins dismissal of U.S. lawsuit over Android app limits A federal judge on Friday dismissed a lawsuit accusing Google Inc of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers that use its Android operating system to make the search engine company's own applications the default option. column3: Feb 19 The Exxon Mobil Corp XOM.N refinery in Torrance
column5: that was hit by an explosion this week was cited last year for eight serious violations following state inspections
column6: but a review cleared the plant this month of all but two serious violations and 12 general violations.  CORRECTED-UPDATE 3-Blast-hit Exxon refinery recently cited for violations - California NEW YORK

column2: U.S. factory activity edges up in February: Markit The U.S. manufacturing sector expanded in February at its fastest rate since November
column3: after notching its lowest reading in a year in the prior month
column4: an industry report showed on Friday.

column5: whose union indirectly controls the largest single block of General Motors Co shares
